title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - 800GB of AI data: Lessons from a failed project (DEV345)
title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - 800GB的AI数据：一个失败项目的教训 (DEV345)
abstract: What happens when an ambitious AI project runs into scale, cost, and data hurdles? This session examines the attempt to process 800GB of gameplay data with AI and the technical roadblocks that prevented completion. Learn about the infrastructure bottlenecks, data preparation issues, and cost overruns that derailed the effort. Discover practical lessons to apply when managing large-scale AI workloads on AWS.
abstract_cn: 当一个雄心勃勃的AI项目遇到规模、成本和数据障碍时会发生什么？本次会议探讨了尝试使用AI处理800GB游戏数据以及阻碍项目完成的技术障碍。了解导致项目失败的基础设施瓶颈、数据准备问题和成本超支。发现在AWS上管理大规模AI工作负载时可应用的实用经验教训。
